title: Start
body:
RagTime: Jazz, honey, hope you ain't misbehavin' down there in Kansas.


[[Jazz: You know it, pops. |Intro1]]

[[Jazz: Can't be staying out late. |Intro1]]

title: Intro1
body:
RagTime: That's what I like to hear! When you coming back to New Orleans?


[[Jazz: I'll be down by Christmas time|Intro2]]

title: Intro2
body:
RagTime: Your mother and I can't wait to see you. But you better not come home like another damn dewdropper. Bring something nice!

[[Jazz: Something nice, pops?|Intro3]]

title: Intro3
body:
RagTime: Yeah something nice - you know? Something hot, something cool, with a a bit of swing thrown in for good measure|.

You get me?


[[Jazz: Something hot?|hotJazz]]
[[Jazz: Something cool?|coolJazz]]
[[Jazz: A bit of swing?|swingJazz]]
[[Jazz: Of course, pops|Intro4]]

title: hotJazz
body:
Good old New Orleans Jazz! Hot, brassy, fun.

Can't go wrong with it.

[[Jazz: Gotcha|DoYouUnderstand]]

title: coolJazz
body:
Jazz and fun under the sun. If you stop by Cali, a tan better not be all you're getting.

[[Jazz: I see|DoYouUnderstand]]

title: swingJazz
body:
Swing music, bebop and all the good stuff. 

Be sure to check out the jazz scene in the Big Apple when you swing by.

[[Jazz: I see|DoYouUnderstand]]

title: Intro4
body:
RagTime: I'll see you on the 25th then. I am sure I don't need to tell you what train to catch now do I?


<<set $day = 23>>
<<set $NY = false>>
<<set $NO = false>>
<<set $CA = false>>
<<set $bebop = false>>
<<set $swing = false>>
<<set $cool = false>>
<<set $vanilla = false>>
<<set $inventory = 0>>

title: DoYouUnderstand
body:
You get me, Jazz?


[[Jazz: Something hot?|hotJazz]]
[[Jazz: Something cool?|coolJazz]]
[[Jazz: A bit of swing?|swingJazz]]
[[Jazz: Of course, pops|Intro4]]
